  • Deprecated Classes

  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    griffon.core.controller.ActionInterceptor
    use ActionHandler instead.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.controller.AbstractActionInterceptor
    use ActionHandler instead.
    org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.configuration.DefaultConfiguration 
    griffon.javafx.support.DelegatingObservableList
    use griffon.javafx.collections.DelegatingObservableList instead.
    griffon.javafx.support.DelegatingObservableMap
    use griffon.javafx.collections.DelegatingObservableMap instead.
    griffon.javafx.support.DelegatingObservableSet
    use griffon.javafx.collections.DelegatingObservableSet instead.
    griffon.javafx.support.MappingObservableList
    use griffon.javafx.collections.MappingObservableList instead.
    griffon.javafx.support.ObservableMapBase
    use griffon.javafx.collections.ObservableMapBase instead.
    griffon.javafx.support.ObservableSetBase
    use griffon.javafx.collections.ObservableSetBase instead.
    griffon.javafx.test.WindowMatchers
    use org.testfx.matcher.base.WindowMatchers instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    griffon.core.controller.ActionManager.addActionInterceptor(ActionInterceptor)
    use addActionHandler instead.
    org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.controller.NoopActionManager.addActionInterceptor(ActionInterceptor)
    griffon.core.event.EventPublisher.addEventListener(Class<E>, CallableWithArgs<?>)
    use the RunnableWithArgs variant instead.
    griffon.core.event.EventPublisher.addEventListener(String, CallableWithArgs<?>)
    use the RunnableWithArgs variant instead.
    griffon.javafx.support.JavaFXUtils.createJavaFXThreadProxyList(ObservableList<E>)
    Use GriffonFXCollections.uiThreadAwareObservableList instead.
    griffon.javafx.support.JavaFXUtils.createJavaFXThreadProxyMap(ObservableMap<K, V>)
    Use GriffonFXCollections.uiThreadAwareObservableMap instead.
    griffon.javafx.support.JavaFXUtils.createJavaFXThreadProxySet(ObservableSet<E>)
    Use GriffonFXCollections.uiThreadAwareObservableSet instead.
    griffon.util.GriffonApplicationUtils.getIsJdk14()
    griffon.util.GriffonApplicationUtils.getIsJdk15()

    griffon.util.GriffonApplicationUtils.isJdk16()
    griffon.util.GriffonApplicationUtils.isJdk17()
    griffon.util.GriffonApplicationUtils.isJdk18()
    griffon.core.event.EventPublisher.removeEventListener(Class<E>, CallableWithArgs<?>)
    use the RunnableWithArgs variant instead.
    griffon.core.event.EventPublisher.removeEventListener(String, CallableWithArgs<?>)
    use the RunnableWithArgs variant instead.
    griffon.pivot.support.PivotAction.setCallable(CallableWithArgs<Void>)
    griffon.swing.support.SwingAction.ActionBuilder.withRunnable(CallableWithArgs<?>)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact.AbstractGriffonArtifact(GriffonApplication)
    Griffon prefers field injection over constructor injector for artifacts as of 2.1.0
